entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Clinton
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:56 PM PST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Clear, -5.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Clinton 7:00 PM PST Saturday 18 February 2023
Condition: Clear
Temperature: -5.0°C
Pressure: 101.8 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Snow beginning after midnight. Amount 5 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 8 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Snow or rain. Temperature steady near plus 2.
entry.summary: Snow changing to rain mixed with snow in the afternoon. Snowfall amount 5 cm except 10 cm over northern sections. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. Temperature steady near plus 2. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Rain mixed with snow. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Rain mixed with snow ending near midnight then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Saturday 18 February 2023
